RumorFact.Text: Solanum wants to try to get to the Vessel. Is it possible for them to get inside Dark Bramble, which is kind of like another dimension?

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum did it! I don't know what their power is, but they are here and waiting for me once again.

Solanum has traced the coordinates of incoming Nomai messages. Canna, the modern Nomai, declares that there's a safe place in the Gloaming Galaxy. The coordinates to Blackrock should be shown under the Vessel's bridge instead of the Eye signal hologram.
I found new coordinates to another Galaxy. We can use the Warp Core from the Ash Twin Project to warp. There will be no turning back once I warp. Am I ready to do this?
